message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this incredible product! I think you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $15000. This is a great deal, and I'm confident you won't find a better price anywhere else.
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate the effort. I am willing to pay $14000 for the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $14500. This is a fair price considering the product's value and quality.
I'm glad we're getting closer, Alice. I'm willing to pay $14200 for the product. I hope this meets your expectations.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to make another concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $14300. This is the lowest I can go, and I think it's still a fair price for the product's value.
Thank you for your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to pay $14250 for the product. I believe this is a fair price for both of us.

I'm getting close to my minimum, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $14200. This is the lowest I can go, and I'm starting to get concerned that we're getting too far apart.
I understand your position, Alice. I'm willing to pay $14150 for the product. I hope this offer is acceptable.
I'm getting close to my limit, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $14100. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to go any lower.
Thank you for your final offer, Alice. I'm willing to pay $14050 for the product. I hope this meets your requirements.
